attributes.action: publicly thank The Daily Telegraph by announcing that the government has recommended a peerage for its Chairman in the next Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Telegraph has opened up the scandal of self serving MP's allowances and expenses by fearlessly publishing information that has been kept from public view by MP's of all parties.In doing so, it has changed the face of politics for evermore.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action that makes a point about government policy.
